_header: If Christmas day on the Monday be
_description: Prognostics from the day on which Christmas falls: the Monday section only — six 6-line stanzas

BLHar2252.First Lines:
Yf crystmas day on the SondayMunday beA
                    trobolus wynter ye shall see…
BLHar2252.Last Lines:
…Shalbe myghtye & stronge persayOf wytte full
                    Reasounabyll
BLHar2252.Note:
‘Sonday’ in the first line has been corrected in a later
                    hand to ‘Munday’ (f. 153v).
BLHar2252.Editions:
Denham,  Michael Aislabie. 
             A Collection of proverbs and popular sayings relating to the seasons,
                the weather, and agricultural pursuits, gathered chiefly from Oral
                Tradition.
Percy Society
         20. London: Richards, 1846: 69-70.
Wright,  Thomas,
                        ed.  
             Specimens of Old Christmas Carols, etc.
Percy Society
         4. London: T. Richard, 1841: 18-19.
